algorithms.confidence_calculation: Risk-weighted coverage confidence with dimension analysis
algorithms.test_generation: LLM-based structured generation with deterministic ID assignment

business_intent: To enhance test coverage transparency and support ISO audit requirements through automated RTM generation.

requirements.description: [1]) Automatic generation of Requirement Traceability Matrix (RTM)
Ensuring each requirement appears once in RTM.
Inclusion of associated test case ID(s) in RTM.
Inclusion of coverage status in RTM.
Deriving RTM directly from test plan.
Non-blocking RTM generation for test plan creation.

ticket_details.description:
Normalized Requirements:
1) Automatic generation of Requirement Traceability Matrix (RTM)
   This capability shall automatically generate a Requirement Traceability Matrix (RTM) for each test plan to ...
ticket_details.summary: Add Requirement Traceability Matrix (RTM) Generation for Test Plans

summary: Generated multiple inferred requirements and corresponding negative tests due to lack of explicit execution mechanisms and acceptance criteria.

api_tests.expected_result: System automatically performs: [1]) Automatic generation of Requirement Traceability Matrix (RTM)
steps: Create a test plan containing at least one requirement and one test case.
Allow the system to complete test plan generation.
Verify that a Requirement Traceability Matrix (RTM) is generated automatically.
Verify the RTM contains exactly one entry per requirement.
Verify each RTM entry includes requirement ID, description, associated test case IDs, and coverage status.
api_tests.title: System-level happy path: [1]) Automatic generation of Requirement Traceability Matrix (RTM)

Verify each RTM entry includes requirement ID, description, associated test case IDs, and coverage status.
api_tests.title: System-level happy path: Ensuring each requirement appears once in RTM.

steps: Navigate to the application
Trigger the action described in the requirement

api_tests.expected_result: System automatically performs: Non-blocking RTM generation for test plan creation.
steps: Create a test plan containing at least one requirement and one test case.
Allow the system to complete test plan generation.
Verify that a Requirement Traceability Matrix (RTM) is generated automatically.
Verify the RTM contains exactly one entry per requirement.
Verify that RTM generation does not block or delay test plan creation.
api_tests.title: System-level happy path: Non-blocking RTM generation for test plan creation.

data_validation_tests.expected_result: RTM artifact must contain all required fields and pass schema validation (must specify exact schema/field names to validate)
steps: Generate RTM for test plan
Download RTM JSON/CSV artifact
Verify RTM contains required fields: requirement_id, requirement_description, coverage_status, test_case_ids (must specify exact field names to check)
data_validation_tests.title: Data Validation: RTM schema integrity for ATA-36-REQ-001

edge_cases.expected_result: Test plan creation must complete immediately; RTM generation must be non-blocking (must specify exact completion status/timeout to verify)
steps: Create test plan with large number of requirements (>=50)
Trigger RTM generation
Verify test plan creation completes without waiting for RTM (must specify exact timing/status to verify)
edge_cases.title: Resilience: Non-blocking RTM generation for ATA-36-REQ-001

negative_tests.expected_result: Requirement description is not included in the RTM. (must specify exact error/status/field to verify)
negative_tests.steps_explanation: No specific steps can be derived from the requirement text.
negative_tests.title: Negative: Missing Requirement Description in RTM

negative_tests.expected_result: RTM generation is blocking the test plan creation. (must specify exact error/status/field to verify)
negative_tests.steps_explanation: No specific steps can be derived from the requirement text.
negative_tests.title: Negative: Blocking RTM Generation
